mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tbl_node_inspire ( public_key, address, name, status, current_stake, init_pos, total_pos, node_released_ong_incentive, node_released_ong_incentive_rate, user_released_ong_incentive, user_released_ong_incentive_rate, node_gas_fee_incentive, node_gas_fee_incentive_rate, user_gas_fee_incentive, user_gas_fee_incentive_rate, node_foundation_bonus_incentive, node_foundation_bonus_incentive_rate, user_foundation_bonus_incentive, user_foundation_bonus_incentive_rate) values
(#{item.publicKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.currentStake,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.initPos,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.totalPos,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.nodeReleasedOngIncentive,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.nodeReleasedOngIncentiveRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userReleasedOngIncentive,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.userReleasedOngIncentiveRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nodeGasFeeIncentive,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.nodeGasFeeIncentiveRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userGasFeeIncentive,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.userGasFeeIncentiveRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nodeFoundationBonusIncentive,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.nodeFoundationBonusIncentiveRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userFoundationBonusIncentive,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.userFoundationBonusIncentiveRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
